nodes.text: The Tynnans were a species of furred and bucktoothed aquatic sentients from the planet Tynna. The species as a whole had an aptitude for bureaucracy, which was put to good use in Deep Current, a resistance group that gathered data about the Galactic Empire.
The Tynnans were created by Brian Daley for his novel Han Solo's Revenge (1979). James Luceno canonized them when he included one in Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel (2016).
